## Iana.loadLanguageRegistriesFromUrls() function

Loads language registries from custom URLs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function loadLanguageRegistriesFromUrls(subtagsUrl: string, extensionsUrl: string): Promise<Result<LanguageRegistries>>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

string


</td><td>

URL to the language subtags registry.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

string

URL to the language tag extensions registry.

</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Result&lt;[LanguageRegistries](./ts-bcp47.iana.languageregistries.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

A Promise with a Result containing the loaded LanguageRegistries or an error.
